Package com.hotel.system

Class Room

java.lang.Object
com.hotel.system.Room
public class Room extends Object
Represents the class of Payment, which holds the information at the instance the payment is made
Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Melissa Ng Li Yun

  • Constructor Details

    • Room

      public Room(RoomType roomType, RoomStatus roomStatus, BedType bedType, String roomId, Boolean withView, Float roomRate, String roomFloor, Integer roomNumber, Boolean wifiEnabled, Boolean smokingStatus)
      Constructor for Room object
      Parameters:
      roomType - defines the type of room it is (SINGLE, DOUBLE, DELUXE, VIP_SUITE)
      roomStatus - defines the status of room (VACANT, OCCUPIED, RESERVED, UNDER_MAINTAINANCE)
      bedType - defines the bed type (SINGLE, DOUBLE, SUPER_SINGLE, QUEEN, KING)
      roomId - uniquely identifies the room
      withView - determines if the room has a view or not
      roomRate - the pricing of the room
      roomFloor - the floor at which the room is at
      roomNumber - the unique room number
      wifiEnabled - determines if the room has wifi or not
      smokingStatus - determines if the room allows smoking or not
